title: Shape-Viewer
description: Shape Viewer is a React.js-based application that allows users to create, view, and manage geometric shapes with dynamic features like drag-and-drop, rotation, and custom file handling

title: 4S Navigation tool extension in Visual Studio Code
description: 4S Navigation Tool is a Visual Studio Code extension designed to boost developer productivity with features like Go to Definition, Subword Search, and Stack Overflow Search.

title: Learn To Adapt
description: It is a PyTorch-based re-implementation of an ACL 2022 paper for Generalized Zero-Shot Text Classification using meta-learning to adapt classifiers for both seen and unseen classes. It supports reproducibility, robustness testing, and multilingual dataset evaluation.

title: AWS-Based Web Development and Deployment
description: This is a full-featured web project that enhances user experience through Bootstrap UI, cookie-based personalization, JavaScript form validation, Ajax-ZIP code lookup, and was deployed on AWS for accessibility and scalability.

title: Prospective Student Survey Application Development
description: This is a full-stack web application built with Angular, Spring Boot, MySQL, JPA, and JDBC. It features dynamic form handling, personalized greetings, ZIP-based auto-fill using Ajax, and robust validation to deliver a seamless user experience.

title: Object Information Retrieval in Real-time
description: It is an Android application built with TensorFlow Lite and the COCO dataset to detect everyday objects in real time and provide audio feedback, enhancing spatial awareness for blind users.
